title: A Reason to Vote
author: VD
content_html:
I’m not unsympathetic to those who argue that it is pointless to vote in the fraudulent exercises known as the U.S. presidential elections. I’ve logically proven that any one vote literally cannot make a difference in any circumstances myself, even without taking the Uniparty into account. But sometimes, exigencies supply imperatives.

By the bowels of Cthulhu, I beseech thee, vote and vote again. As many times as they will permit thee, vote, dammit, by all means, vote for Donald Trump!

DISCUSS ON SG
